title: Devil and the Deep
creator_credit: Harry Hervey, Marion Gering, Travis Banton, Benn W. Levy and Paramount
brief_description: Naval commander Charles Storm has made life miserable for his wife Diana due to his insane jealousy over every man she speaks to. His obsessive behavior soon drives her to the arms of a handsome lieutenant. When Charles learns of their affair, he plots revenge.
creator_credit_for_label: Harry Hervey, Marion Gering, Travis Banton, Benn W. Levy and Paramount
